Creating a Visualization From Scratch

To create a visualization from scratch, all code will need to instantiate a :VegaVisualization type, which comes with a handful of default values. As stated in the Visualization Primitives section, we will always work with Julia types, there is no need to worry about the JSON representation (although it can always be viewed using tojson()):

Note that the above doesnâ€™t represent the minimum necessary structure for building a Vega visualization; rather, it represents the default values when a new :VegaVisualization is created. An example of a full JSON object based on a fully-specified :VegaVisualization is provided below:
